phrases: hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida

futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida

kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari

donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda

Fly high, high into the sky,

Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age

I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
sono ashi wa arukidasu
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
sono ashi wa arukidasu
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
yagate kuru kakoku mo
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
yagate kuru kakoku mo
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Futaki-san?
Why?
Why are you pretending to be me?
Chiffon cake?
No way...
No way!
You cannot do that!
Futaki-san!
I even put color contacts in.
You would bake chiffon cake better than me...
You are trying to show Riki-kun that you are better than me at everything!
You are laughing at how pitiful I am, are not you?
But how?!
You cannot touch eggs!
How did you bake a chiffon cake?!
You simply assumed that I cannot touch eggs.
You said so yourself!
You said you were allergic to them!
You lied to me?!
Losing your patience?
Cooking eggs was the only thing you could do, huh?
Anything with eggs in it.
Shut up.
It is the only thing you could do better than me, huh?
Shut up...
Shut up!
Let go!
Let go of me!
Calm down!
Why do you always have to take everything from me?!
Trying to play the tragic heroine?
You want someone to pity you for being the unhappiest person on the planet?
Good for you.
You have found someone who will do that.
But you see, it is all an illusion.
People cannot save each other.
They are not God.
What is wrong?
You hate me, do not you?
Then hit me harder.
They call you a good-for-nothing because you do not even have the guts for that!
I wish you would just die.
You liar.
You liar!
That is right.
I am a liar.
I have been one for as long as I can remember.
Goodbye.
For some reason,
the pouring rain seemed to me like Futaki-san's tears.
Naoe-san, do you think that Kanata-san is a mean person too?
Kud?
Please, do not think of her as a bad person.
In our room, she is a very kind and mellow person.
There has to be a reason why she pretends to be so cold outside.
She must be hiding something painful from us.
Something painful?
She always tosses and turns in her sleep.
And I saw!
You saw?
What?
Um... um...
I do not think it is something I can tell you!
I wanted to do something for her,
but I cannot do anything...
Forget I ever said that!
Sorry!
I hope one day we can walk...
You do not need to leave.
Naoe Riki.
You came to ask me why I did that.
Am I right?
And if I did?
What would you say?
I wanted to test you.
You want to pretend you are God and save her.
But what do you really want?
Why did you lie to Saigusa-san?
Of all the things I thought you would say.
In a home economics class in elementary school,
we had to cook something at school and bring back pictures to show our families.
We happened to have a competition that day.
A competition?
Our relatives were going to compare us to see who was better, as always.
Incidentally, our cooking would be used to judge us.
What are you going to make, Kanata?
What about you, Haruka?
An omelette, I think.
The family told me to make an omelette as well.
But if I made the same thing and won,
they would beat Haruka.
So...
So?
I made miso soup.
I messed up again.
They kicked me out.
But why did not you make an omelette too, Kanata?
Huh?
How come?
Well...
You lied that you could not touch eggs?
Yes.
So I am the only one who can cook eggs?
Y-Yeah.
Oh...
I see.
Something only she could do.
That became Saigusa-san's hope?
She believed that lie to this day.
Funny, is not it?
I told you I was a liar.
For as long as I can remember.
Always.
In other words, Futaki-san lied so you would not get hurt.
Why are you telling me this?
Are you trying to say it is not her fault?
You are saying it is my fault?!
Because I am his kid?!
Because I am a criminal's...
Saigusa
Shou's kid?!
No!
That is not it!
If it is not her fault, then who am I supposed to hate?!
Who?!
Baseball
Team
Team
Team
Team
Team
Saigusa was reviled and rejected for ages.
She could only keep her sense of self by hating Futaki.
Without someone to hate, she would not have lived this long.
What should I do?
At this rate, Saigusa-san's dark emotions will overwhelm her.
Baseball
Team
But what can I do in this situation?
Only Saigusa can find the answer.
Saigusa needs to figure out what she really wants.
Maybe that is what you need to tell her.
Because it is the only way to free yourself from the invisible chains of hate.
Do not you think so, Riki?
What Saigusa-san really wants...
What could that be?
H-Hey-yo.
Sorry for yelling at you back there.
Everything I do is trouble for you.
I am really sorry.
Did not you promise not to apologize all the time?
Yeah, I did.
Oh, right.
Here.
I think it is best if you gave this back to Futaki-san.
Why?
Hey, Saigusa-san...
What do you really want?
Th-That is obvious.
I want to know whose kid I am.
Will that really solve the problem?
It will!
If I really am his kid, I can have closure!
What if it turns out that Futaki-san is his kid?
Then they will tear Futaki-san apart.
You will force something negative on her.
Why not?
She deserves to feel my pain.
Really?
Do you really feel that way from the bottom of your heart?
If you two keep forcing negatives on each other, neither of you will be happy.
I think you know that deep down inside.
What should I do?
Riki-kun, what should I do?
I cannot tell you.
No one can.
The answer is inside your heart.
Inside my heart?
If it is clouded with hate, you will not be able to see the answer.
You need to find what you really want from the bottom of your heart.
Something more important than hate.
Something more important than hate?
I hope one day we can walk hand-in-hand.
Baseball
Team
Kuu-chan, Rin-chan, are you worried about Futaki-san and Haru-chan too?
Yes, I am.
Yeah.
Haru-chan's trying as hard as she can.
I am sure happiness will find its way to her.
We will all be happy in the end.
You... think so?
I really hope so.
Muscles!
Muscles!
You got to train your muscles when you are worried!
Nishizono-san is not answering.
I wonder why.
Hey there, Psychopathic Maracas.
You have got the face of someone with happy muscles today.
Looks like you have gotten over something.
I have figured out how I feel.
Mind explaining why you called me out here?
I have decided.
I need to talk to you.
I am not going to hate or fear you anymore.
I will tell you the truth.
What do you want from me now?
I want you to tell me.
Who my real father is.
What a waste of time.
Please!
Then get on your knees and beg.
Please, tell me.
Are you stupid?
Have you no shame?
I have decided to stop running away.
I am going to face it.
Looks like you have got some confidence.
Did one of you become God and save her?
There is no God here.
All we have got in this world is us.
We simply faced each other, talked things through, and found our answer.
I think you want to talk things through with Saigusa-san from the bottom of your heart too.
If you knew, you would lose the life you have had until now.
Do you still want to know?
I have friends I can count on.
For the first time in my life, I do not want to think that no one needs me.
I do not want to hate anyone anymore.
I do not want to be the person I have been up till now.
So tell me the truth.
For a long time, they would give me all the toys and snacks I wanted,
as long as I beat you.
When Dad refused to tell the truth after he was put in prison,
our relatives wanted to know which of us was the daughter of the criminal.
But even when I won, and they said that I was better than you,
their suspicion that I might be the disgrace of the family never disappeared.
The Futaki family loved whipping me with a leather belt whenever I went easy on you.
They were all monsters who rejoiced in the idea of giving me more scars.
Kudryavka would know.
Anyone who saw what is under these long sleeves would be horrified.
I put up with the pain.
I got used to the pain in my heart.
I worked really hard.
Studying, sports, and etiquette...
I could not even sleep because I had to be better.
I had to secure the succession of the Saigusa family.
Why?
They said that if neither of us was good enough, they would no longer have any use for us.
No way!
Was not it just to decide which of us would succeed the family?
They could not bear it.
They did not want the family's reputation sullied from having the daughter of a criminal.
So they ordered me to hate you.
But I could not.
Because...
You are...
You are...
my little sister!
And nobody can ever change that fact!
But they told me not to talk to you.
Not to hold your hand.
Not to be nice to you.
They said they would buy me anything I wanted if I listened.
Still, I shook my head.
Then they told me...
If you will not listen, then you can be her.
Pitiful little Haruka.
I was not scared of being whipped or yelled at.
I was scared because I could not nod!
They said that they would kill one of us.
If we had to kill one of them, it would be Haruka.
Right, Kanata?
Is that why you had to be hard on Saigusa-san?
If I did not, Haruka...
They would kill Haruka.
Haruka...
It is okay now.
It is okay.
It is not!
It cannot be okay!
There is no way it could be!
I did so many bad things!
I am not even worthy of touching your hand!
Haruka?
I am sorry.
Why are you apologizing?
Because I kept thinking that only I had a hard time.
Even though I should have known all along.
Mom and Dad sent us these in secret.
They are birthday presents for us!
You are giving me one too, Kanata?
Yeah.
We have to pretend we do not like each other right now.
But trust me, Haruka.
One day, we will go see Mom and Dad together.
Yeah!
Walking hand-in-hand.
At some point, I lost my trust in you.
But my heart always remembered.
That we promised that day.
Will you forgive me?
Thank you.
Haruka, if you want to,
let us end it all now.
Kanata?
Haruka?
Dad, I have decided to leave the family.
So tell Haruka the truth.
Your mom and us
were childhood friends raised in the Saigusa family.
We both loved her.
And they forced her to marry both of us.
But the one she truly loved was not me.
The pain of all three of us living together was too much.
When you twins were born, I decided to take myself out of the picture.
She and he tried to leave carrying the two of you.
But the Saigusa family was angered and took you both from their arms.
That is where I came in.
You were too important.
I had to protect you both from that sick, twisted family at all costs.
Your lives were too important.
In the end, I could not protect you two.
But please remember.
All three of us wanted both of you to be born.
None of us have forgotten you even for a moment.
This is a letter from your mom.
She cannot wait for the day she sees both of you again.
Now, Haruka, let me answer your last question.
The one you wanted to know most.
Haruka?
I thought everyone in the world hated me.
I thought everyone is heart was full of hate.
But I was wrong.
I just wanted to know if there are evil people in the world.
It is no one's fault.
I do not need to hate anyone.
I know that now.
So I do not need to know whose kid I am.
I can love myself.
That is all I really wanted to know.
I wanted to believe it more than anything.
That no one was evil in the world.
